item.title: Research_lab_works
item.description: The research is about a question with a wrong presupposition, and we need to correct the presupposition and give a correct result. CREPE: Open-Domain Question Answering with False Presuppositions ðŸŽ¯ Target The authors introduced CREPE, a QA dataset containing a natural distribution of presupposition failures from online information-seeking forums. ðŸ“¦ Dataset CREPE, a QA dataset containing a natural distribution of presupposition failures from online information-seeking forums. Data Source: Reddit, the ELI5 subreddit.
